articles.title: Stock Market LIVE: Sensex sheds 200 pts; Asian Paints lags, Hindalco shines | Mint - Mint

articles.title: Digvijaya Singh Is On. Congress President Polls Gets Another Contender - NDTV
articles.description: Digvijaya Singh today arrived to collect nomination forms in a precursor, formally joining the contest for Congress president.
articles.content:

articles.title: What Next For Ashok Gehlot? Meet With Sonia Gandhi Begins: 10 Facts - NDTV
articles.description: Ashok Gehlot met with Sonia Gandhi this afternoon after some delay amid turmoil over the Congress president election and the Rajasthan crisis. The Rajasthan Chief Minister arrived in Delhi late last night for the meeting.
articles.content:
• The outcome of the meeting has huge implications on who will be the third candidate for Congress president. Whether Ashok Gehlot will run for the post will be known after the meeting.
